property.name: local_data_dir
property.description: Location on local FS where the examples are stored

property.name: sample_data_dir
property.description: Location on local FS where the data for the examples is stored

property.name: remote_data_dir
property.description: Location on HDFS where the oozie examples and workflows are stored

property.name: oozie_jobs_count
property.description: Maximum of Oozie workflows or coodinators to retrieve in one API call.

property.name: enable_cron_scheduling
property.description: Use Cron format for defining the frequency of a Coordinator instead of the old frequency number/unit

property.name: enable_document_action
property.description: Flag to enable the saved Editor queries to be dragged and dropped into a workflow

property.name: oozie_url
property.description: The URL where the Oozie service runs on. This is required in order for users to submit jobs. Empty value disables the config check.

property.name: security_enabled
property.description: Requires FQDN in oozie_url if enabled

property.name: remote_deployement_dir
property.description: Location on HDFS where the workflows/coordinator are deployed when submitted
